content:
This addon may be what you're seeking: 

https://services.addons.thunderbird.net/eN-US/thunderbird/addon/gmail-conversation-view/?src=cb-dl-users
creator: davidsk

content: A suggestion: shut thunderbird down and check mail on server. Sometimes, issues such as you describe are being done at server prior to Thunderbird accessing the messages.
creator: davidsk

content: Probeer het eens in De probleemoplossingsmodus van Thunderbird. Ik vermoed een add-on die dwars ligt.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content: Hebt u al eens geprobeerd de bovenliggende map te repareren? Dit doet u via uw rechtermuisknop > Eigenschappen > Map repareren.
creator: markh2

content: were you ever able to send/receive? or is this a new setup? what is complete text of error messages for receiving and sending? Can you post screenshots of incoming server settings pane and of SMTP server settings pane? Those screenshots are often useful. thank you
creator: davidsk

content: Het berichtenpaneel wordt overigens alleen in de klassieke opmaak onder de koptekst getoond, in de verticale opmaak wordt het bericht naast de koptekst getoond. Zie ook Van start met het hoofdvenster in Thunderbird (Supernova en nieuwer).
creator: markh2

content: I'm sorry, I meant to say it corrects itself in Troubleshoot mode.
creator: Vanessalf

content: I'm quite new to Thunderbird myself, but at a guess it is probably because of the font (or addon) you are using for the menus etc, which maybe cannot display the symbols used for minimize, maximize and close. Sorry I don't know any more, I'm still learning myself.
creator: VeeBee
